data.title: How's Your Association Going? (2K11)
data.meta_description: Don't know what to do here need some oppinions In my Wiz association I drafted Jonas V. with the 5th pick. He is a good back up for Mcgee. Should I
data.text:
MVP

OVR: 0

Join Date: Sep 2008

Posts: 2,448

Re: How's Your Association Going? (2K11)

After an hour or so of editing so teams would get their picks (for the most part..), I'm now ready to start the 2011-2012 season with the Nets.

In free agency, I was able to snag Nene (albeit in a sign-and-trade where I gave them Marcus Thornton, a backup in Outlaw, Petro as a filler, and a 1st rounder) and then sign AK47 for cheap, while retaining Kris Humphries. The Nets now have a very solid trio of big men moving forward to please Deron Williams (hopefully).

My opening game was against the Knicks, which is great for the rivalry in the works. Carmelo Anthony went off for 41 points, but Amar'e fouled out in the 4th.

That being said, I was able to pull off a 7 point win at the Garden thanks to a double-double by Deron Williams and a 23 point game by Brook Lopez (still a horrible rebounder though.. with 3 haha)

Marshon Brooks and Nene both made solid debuts and I'm liking what they bring to the team which looks like this:

Deron Williams / Jordan Farmar / Sundiata Gaines

Marshon Brooks / Anthony Morrow / Sasha Vujacic

Andrei Kirilenko / Damion James

Nene / Kris Humphries / Al Harrington

Brook Lopez / Jordan Williams

Rookie

OVR: 0

Join Date: Mar 2011

Re: How's Your Association Going? (2K11)

To all you Cavs fans on this boards i want to share this with you. Here is my cavs association status.

We're in the first round of the 2012 eastern conference playoffs against the Miami Heat here's the breakdown

My Cavs Roster

Lebron James

Rajon Rondo

Wilson Chandler

Alonzo Gee

The series is tied 2-2 and tonight is game 5 in Cleveland and then game 6 will be in Miami Game 7 will be in Cleveland.

Here's the rest of the Eastern conference playoffs status in my association

Charlotte Bobcats Vs Indiana Pacers Series Tied 2-2

New York Knicks Vs Milwaukee Bucks Series Tied 2-2

Chicago Bulls Vs Atlanta Chicago Leads Series 3-1

Western Conference Playoffs Round 1

Oklahoma Thunder Vs Memphis Grizzlies Memphis Leads Series 3-1

Houston Rockets Vs Denver Nuggets Denver Leads Series 3-1

Los Angeles Lakers Vs Los Angeles Clippers Series Tied 2-2

Minnesota Timberwolves Vs Utah Jazz Series Tied 2-2

I hope to win tonight's game Miami is tough and mario chalmers and dwayne wade are both insane with the 3pts shooting . but looking at my roster and miami roster what do you guys think of my situation and to all my cavs fans tonight is the night i need all the support in the world Cavs Fans Unite i will post and update throughout the whole series and keep you guys informed

Re: How's Your Association Going? (2K11)

So I simmed up to trade deadline. I checked Kevin Love's morale dude is the happiest guy on planet smh, I really wanted to trade him away. His morale said something like how he loves the fans, the organization and he wants to work on a contract extension ASAP. I felt that it would be unrealistic if I traded him away, so I only got rid of Beasley who had his mind set on cashing on alot of fetti this summer.

I tried doing the Iggy deal, but Lou Williams being injured ruined it, 2K needs to allow us to trade injured players because it happens in real life. So I decided to go after Rudy Gay in Memphis.

So the trade was:

Minny receives:

Rudy Gay

1st Rd Pick

Grizzlies receives:

Michael Beasley

Shane Battier

1st Rd Pick

Now my roster is:

Ridnour/Rubio

Wesley Johnson/Ellington

Rudy Gay/Korver

Kevin Love/Anthony Randolph

Darko/Enes Kanter/Tolliver

I'm gonna play at least 5-10 more games before I sim to the Playoffs. We currently stand 8th seed in the West, hopefully we could stay there.

__________________
